item.description:
Dinner and a show: Sincerity Forever, a play by Mac Wellman.

Directed by Jessi D. Hill

Something isn't quite right in the town of
Hillsbottom, USA. Local residents have their
suspicions, but can't put their finger on the cause
of their unease. Winner of the 1990 Obie Award for
Best New American Play, Mac Wellman's poetic parable
is a scathing and hysterical attack on the veiling
of right-wing bigotry and hypocrisy in the name of
religion.

Everyone is welcome. We'll meet at 7:00 PM for the dinner portion.

Please buy tickets for the 8:30 PM show ASAP, while there are still some left: http://www.yalecabare...
item.name: Sincerity Forever at the Yale Cabaret
